uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core
Class AbstractComponent

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.AbstractComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public abstract class AbstractComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component

Abstract base class for Components.

Implements the interface with no operation methods.

Author:
Dan Cowan

componentAdded

public void componentAdded(Component component)
Description copied from interface: Component
Call-back allows the ComponentRegistry to inform this Component that another Component has been registered.

This method can be used to register listeners on the newly registered Component.

Specified by:
componentAdded in interface Component
See Also:
Component.componentAdded(uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.Component)

componentRemoved

public void componentRemoved(Component component)
Description copied from interface: Component
Call-back allows the ComponentRegistry to inform this Component that another Component has been removed.

This method should be used to remove listeners previously registered Component and otherwise tidy up any relationship.

Specified by:
componentRemoved in interface Component
See Also:
Component.componentRemoved(uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.Component)
